property.name: fieldsToDisplay
property.label: Fields to Display
property.description: Separate multiple fields using commas. Include only API names, and always add the 'Id' field. Use dot notation to reference parent fields. For example, to include Account.Name, specify both Account.Id and Account.Name. Only one level of hierarchy is supported to display parent fields. property.name: orderASCDESC

property.name: buttons
property.label: Buttons
property.description: Use ',' to add multiple buttons. Avoid using unwanted spaces.

property.name: searchableFields
